metadata.title: CVE-2020-5243 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: uap-core before 0.7.3 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack whenprocessing crafted User-Agent strings. Some regexes are vulnerable toregular expression denial of service (REDoS) due to overlapping capturegroups. This allows remote attackers to overload a server by setting theUser-Agent header in an HTTP(S) request to maliciously crafted longstrings. This has been patched in uap-core 0.7.3.

criterions.comment: uap-core package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
